name: Midnight Sun
description:
sunflower takes a break to give out some presents to some chill chillren on winter holiday time. though it's just whatever things they happen to have, it's probably fine.

default controls:
arrows - move
z - jump
x - dash
up+z - highjump
start - pause

if you like these sorts of things consider supporting me on patreon - https://www.patreon.com/RainbowCemetery
